traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Goliaths have lifespans comparable to humans. They enter adulthood in their late teens and usually live less than a century.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Goliath society, with its clear roles and tasks, has a strong lawful bent. The goliath sense of fairness, balanced with an emphasis on self-sufficiency and personal accountability, pushes them toward neutrality.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Goliaths are between 7 and 8 feet tall and weigh between 280 and 340 pounds. Your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Natural Athlete
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Athletics skill.

traits.name: Stone's Endurance
traits.description: You can focus yourself to occasionally shrug off injury. When you take damage, you can use your reaction to roll a dl2. Add your Constitution modifier to the number rolled, and reduce the damage by that total. After you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

traits.name: Powerful Build
traits.description: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

traits.name: Mountain Born
traits.description: You're acclimated to high altitude, including elevations above 20,000 feet. You're also naturally adapted to cold climates, as described in chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Common and Giant.
